WorkflowInfo.Name: Archive files older than 30 days and delete original
WorkflowInfo.Description: Archive files older than 30 days and delete original. Copy the archive to a remote server.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ZipCompress;Assembly=ZipCompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:DeleteFile;Assembly=DeleteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server2</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server3</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>192.168.1.1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%ServersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="%ServerName%" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TimeSelection="30.00:00:00" Path="c:\logs" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="True" MapDrive="True" /> <ns5:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="getFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%folderList1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'File'" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getFiles%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getFiles" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FilePath" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%getFiles%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FileName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%getFiles%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns6:ZipCompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="%ServerName%" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Zip Compression" IsValid="True" HostId="1" x:Name="zipCompress1" TypeName="ZipCompress" DstPath="c:\Archive\%FileName%.zip" SrcHostName="LocalHost" EncryptionType="Standard" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="%FilePath%" ArchivePassword="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a Zip Compressed file with the specified compression type." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" ZipCompressionLevel="Super Fast" SrcUserName="" /> <ns7:DeleteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFile1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete File" Path="%FilePath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected file." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFile" UserName="" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of all files in a specific folder on a group of servers, and creates a ZIP file from any file that is larger than 5 MB. This process can be followed by a Delete File activity (original file) to help you maintain your serverÂ’s free disk space.
